Messages.message: We just got a new puppy!

They're dropping the charges against me!

That guy just stole my car!
Can you believe Chad is cheating on me AGAIN?
Ugh, I hate this song!
Theres a strange guy who is stalking me lately...
Have you seen my vape?!
I stepped on a nail... I might get tetanus

The drinks here suck!
Dude, they're out of fireball? F%&@!
The music sucks, we should put someone else on aux
I think i dropped my lighter around here.
Yeah my girlfriend broke up with me,|and my mom died,| and my dad got deported,| but i got the van!
Melissa was really getting on my nerves,| but I can smoke now without inturruptions
Its hump day!| But i gotta work tomorrow
AHHHHH AHHHHH,| WHY CAN'T I SEE,| HELP ME
Did you just step on my shoe?| I just got these!
Shotssss!| Pour one out for mom!| Hey did you just puke on my shoe?
Why is this line so long?| Im gonna piss my pants!
Hey those are my keys!| Wait, oh no I can't find my keys.| I'll have to buy a damn uber.

Yeah so the thirteenth king of the Cynthian kingdom died to a plague,| but his son was actually the one to bring peace to the reigon.| I think this was a stupid writing decision personally| but my mom says i should get a job. Whatever
Have you ever heard of the Horus Heresy?
